channel.title: New technical documentation about OpenPGP keys in Whonix
channel.description:
[html]

Ever wanted to know what the whonix_shared/usr/share/whonix/keys/ folder is about? See: https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/whonix_shared/usr/share/whonix/keys/readme

[/html]
